price: (71) [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّي خَٰلِقُۢ بَشَرٗا مِّن طِينٖ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: idh qāla rabbuka lil'malāikati innī khāliqun basharan min ṭīnin
